mean_cn: adj. 自命不凡的，势利的
mean_en: thinking that having a high social class is very important; feeling that you are better than other people because you are more intelligent or like things that many people do not like
sentence: He's so snobbish because he only makes friends with rich people.
sentence_trans: 他真是个势利眼，因为他只和有钱人交朋友。
word_etyma: snobb=snob势利眼 + ish表形容词，“像…一样，有的…” → 势利眼的
